tool_description: Send SMS & text-to-speech messages, perform phone number lookups and much more via seven.io.
title: sms77io

api_list.name: Home Location Register
api_list.description: Retrieves ***H*ome *L*ocation *R*egister** information for a given phone number.

api_list.name: Get Contacts
api_list.description: Retrieves all contacts for a given API key.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Decides whether to return response as JSON or CSV (default).

api_list.name: Get Status
api_list.description: Get a delivery report for a message ID sent with your API key.

required_parameters.name: msg_id
required_parameters.description:
The message ID of the SMS.
Can be obtained by setting parameter *JSON*, *return_msg_id* or *details* to **1** when sending SMS via the API.
Alternatively it can be retrieved from the message journal in the user area.

api_list.name: Caller Name Delivery
api_list.description: Retrieves ***C*alling *N*ame *D*elivery** information for a phone number.

api_list.name: Mobile Number Portability
api_list.description: Retrieves ***M*obile *N*umber *P*ortability** information for a given phone number.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return plain text or detailed JSON.

api_list.name: Get Pricing
api_list.description: Retrieves pricing information for a single country or all.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
An ISO Code of the country you wish to retrieve the pricing for.
*Examples*:

-  \"de\" for Germany 
- \"uk\" for Great Britain
- \"fr\" for France

If this parameter is *not* specified, the prices of *all* countries are getting returned.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return the response as *JSON* or *CSV*. The **default** is *JSON*.

api_list.name: Get Balance
api_list.description: Retrieves the account balance for the given API key.

api_list.name: Create Contact
api_list.description: Creates a single contact for a given API key.

api_list.name: Create Webhook
api_list.description: Creates a webhook with the given configuration.

required_parameters.name: event_type
required_parameters.description: Type of event for which you would like to receive a webhook.

optional_parameters.name: request_method
optional_parameters.description: Request method used for webhook receivement. The default value is **POST**

api_list.name: Delete Webhook
api_list.description: Deletes the webhook with the given ID.

api_list.name: Number Format Lookup
api_list.description: Retrieves the network operator as well as additional (porting) information for the given phone number.

api_list.name: Outbound
api_list.description: Retrieves outbound messages history.

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Message status - e.g. *completed* / *failed* for **Voice** or *DELIVERED* / *NOTDELIVERED* for **SMS**

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Message ID

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Receiver phone number in any format

api_list.name: Inbound
api_list.description: Retrieves inbound messages history.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Receiver phone number in any format

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Message status - e.g. *completed* / *failed* for **Voice** or *DELIVERED* / *NOTDELIVERED* for **SMS**

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Message ID

api_list.name: Replies
api_list.description: Retrieves message replies history.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Message ID

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Receiver phone number in any format

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Message status - e.g. *completed* / *failed* for **Voice** or *DELIVERED* / *NOTDELIVERED* for **SMS**

api_list.name: Create
api_list.description: Creates a new subaccount.

required_parameters.name: X-Api-Key
required_parameters.description: Your sms77 API key which you can create in your [developer dashboard](https://app.sms77.io/developer).

api_list.name: Read
api_list.description: Retrieves information regarding subacounts.

optional_parameters.name: X-Api-Key
optional_parameters.description: Your sms77 API key for authentication.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms77io.p.rapidapi.com/subaccounts?action=read"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms77io.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Delete Contact
api_list.description: Deletes a single contact by ID for the given API key.

api_list.name: Get Analytics
api_list.description: Get detailed statistics of your account directly through our API.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description:
Start date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
By default, the date of 30 days ago is set.

optional_parameters.name: label
optional_parameters.description:
Shows only data of a specific label.
Allowed values: 'all' (default) or <label>.

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description:
End date of the statistics.
By default, the current day.

optional_parameters.name: subaccounts
optional_parameters.description: Receive the data only for the main account, all your (sub-)accounts or only for specific subaccounts. Allowed values: 'only_main', 'all' or subaccount ID.

optional_parameters.name: group_by
optional_parameters.description: Defines the grouping of the data.

api_list.name: Get Webhooks
api_list.description: Retrieves all existing webhooks.

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.description: Send SMS to one/multiple user(s) and/or contact(s).

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Recipient number – possible are numbers and address book entries (groups and contacts). Multiple recipients can be specified separated by commas

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Dear customer. We want to say thanks for your trust. Use code MINUS10 for 10 % discount on your next order!

optional_parameters.name: performance_tracking
optional_parameters.description: Enable [Performance Tracking](https://help.sms77.io/en/performance-tracking-1) for URLs found in the message text

optional_parameters.name: return_msg_id
optional_parameters.description: If this parameter is set, the ID of the SMS is output in the second line after the status code.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description:
Date/time for time-delayed SMS. Expects a UNIX timestamp or a date string with format YYYY-MM-DD hh:ii
**Examples**: 1141511104 or 2016-03-04 23:25:04

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Sender number. **Maximum length**: 11 alphanumeric or 16 numeric characters.

optional_parameters.name: ttl
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the validity period of the SMS in milliseconds.

optional_parameters.name: udh
optional_parameters.description: Individual User Data Header of the SMS. If specified and variable text contains *hexcode*, the message will be sent as 8-bit binary SMS.

optional_parameters.name: debug
optional_parameters.description: If activated no SMS will be sent or calculated.

optional_parameters.name: unicode
optional_parameters.description: Transmission as Unicode to support Cyrillic, Arabic etc characters. The SMS length is thereby reduced to 70 characters. Please note that our gateway recognizes the coding automatically. This parameter is therefore not necessary. You can, however, force a certain transmission method hereby.

optional_parameters.name: flash
optional_parameters.description: Send SMS as Flash SMS. These are displayed directly in the receiver’s display.

optional_parameters.name: label
optional_parameters.description: You can optionally set a separate label for each SMS so that you can assign it to your statistics. **Allowed characters**: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@

optional_parameters.name: no_reload
optional_parameters.description: Switch off reload lock. This lock prevents the sending of the same SMS (text, type and recipient alike) within 180 seconds. You can deactivate this lock permanently in your login under Settings > SMS.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: The output is more detailed in JSON format

optional_parameters.name: utf8
optional_parameters.description: Forces the detection as a UTF8 character set and overrides automatic recognition of the API

optional_parameters.name: details
optional_parameters.description: Shows numerous details to the sent SMS. Handy for debugging.

optional_parameters.name: foreign_id
optional_parameters.description: Provide your own ID for this message. You will get the foreign_id in return back in DLR callbacks etc. **Maximum length**: 64 chars; **allowed characters**: a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@

api_list.name: Validate Caller ID
api_list.description: The caller ID validation API allows you to automatically validate caller IDs for the *Voice API*. After calling this endpoint you will get a code back if successful. At the same time, the phone number is going to receive a call from us. The returned code must then be entered via *DTMF* using the telephone’s keypad.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to be validated. The format is almost arbitrary – our gateway automatically formats the number correctly.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Callback URL that gets called as soon as the validation has been performed successfully.

api_list.name: Send Voice Call
api_list.description: Via the Voice Api of sms77 you can issue calls to certain phone numbers. The simplest way is to specify a text which is read to the recipient via our Text-to-Speech Gateway. For advanced applications, you have the option of sending the text in XML format.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text message to be read or XML data.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description:
Specifies the recipient number.
Allowed are numbers and address entries (contacts only). Currently just one recipient per call is possible.

optional_parameters.name: xml
optional_parameters.description: Specifies whether the text variable is a plain text to be read, or an XML format.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Caller ID. Please use only verified sender IDs, one of your virtual inbound numbers or one of our shared virtual numbers.

api_list.name: Edit Contact
api_list.description: Edit a contact with a given ID.

optional_parameters.name: empfaenger
optional_parameters.description: The contacts phone number.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The contacts email address.

optional_parameters.name: nick
optional_parameters.description: The contacts name.

api_list.name: Voice
api_list.description: Retrieves voice messages history.

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: End date for performed search

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: Message ID

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: Message status - e.g. *completed* / *failed* etc.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Receiver phone number in any format

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description: Start date for performed search
